experience.title: Founder
experience.description: With a growing community of 1,00,000+ customers worldwide, we continue to transform the landscape of an ancient craft past 3 years. Our commitment towards textile upliftment, resonates through every intricately woven garment, showcasing the rich heritage of Banaras to the world. The brandâ€™s customer-centric approach ensures an exceptional experience as we offer an extensive collection of 5,000+ innovative designs. We have garnered immense recognition and acclaim, having been featured prominently in renowned publications and endorsed by influential celebrities across various industries. Discover our curated collection of meticulously crafted designs at www.zaribanaras.com~ Threads of Banaras, Woven for the World
